description: Fully multiplicative with a(p(k)) = Fib(k+2) for k-th prime p.
comments: Numbers n such that a(n)=n are exactly 5-smooth numbers (A051037). - _Ivan Neretin_, Aug 30 2015
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: If n = Product p(k)^e(k) then a(n) = Product Fibonacci(k+2)^e(k).Multiplicative with a(p^e) = A000045(A000720(p)+2)^e. - _David W. Wilson_, Aug 01, 2001.
author: _Marc LeBrun_, _N. J. A. Sloane_.
